worksArray.title: Love Together
worksArray.description: Love Together is a relationship coaching app. Answer survey questions, match with a partner, and discuss!

worksArray.title: Chirp
worksArray.description: Chirp is a social media platform. Keep up with people from around the globe, or just post funny memes.

worksArray.title: Goggle Earth
worksArray.description: Goggle Earth is an application that can be used to satisfy your curiosity about our great blue planet! Place a pin, and info related to that place will show up in the info tab.
